name: Mining for Miners
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 48 game jam.

Attention miner! The mine has been taken over by a rival company, many miners have been taken hostage and sent to the bottom of the mine. A rescue mission is needed...

Controls:

     - AD/Arrows to move left/right

     - W/Up/Space to jump

     - Hold left click to knock enemies unconscious with your shovel
